Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • rolit.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComputerPlayer

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Initializes and maintains a player object, with its attached properties
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Yuri van Midden and Victor Lap
